Object.Description: A red skull, stained with the blood of only a portion of its victims.
Known in the ancient world to be strong against the most powerful armies in existence.
A velvet cloak that sends the user into a different dimension itself.
A one-of-a-kind quiver forged by Bloodorcs to pierce through the mightiest demons.
Harnesses the power of time and space itself into an extremely harmful burst.
Legends say that the fountains of the Nexus were all made out of this one book.
A tough, reinforced helm only gifted to warriors who fight in self-defense.
A tough, steel shield coated with rough, hot magma rock that burns all enemies who dare approach it.
A devilish orb that traps your foes in the 1940s for 9 seconds!
This seal is said to contain an amount of power too extreme for one to handle.
A prism once used to take control of his enemies souls, causing them to forever wander in search of the illusion they saw.
A bloodwef- I mean, blue scepter adorned with sapphires, used by an ancient sect of masterful wiz- I mean, sorcerers.
A skull sporting a crown from its past necrotic king who died to the extent of his own power.
The strongest trap ever created. Some say it stopped a giant meteor from crashing into the planet.
A cloak once worn by a fiendish Phantom. Their victims never even had time to notice they were being attacked.
A lime-green quiver woven with green cloth that gleams with the power of Artemis.
Shoots a powerful burst of death itself onto your foes.
A mighty tome used by the ancients themselves.
A great warrior who puts in major sacrifice will also take out major amounts of their foes.
Whoever is targeted by this shield is guaranteed doom. Whoever wields this shield is guaranteed life.
Used by one of the greatest heroes of all time, Vorv.
This seal was used by the gods, but gave them a curse when mortals recieved them.
A cloak worn by the Joker of Time, and has been unholy since his death.
A time capsule the fits right into an orb!
This stone forged from blood makes your limbs weaker but your internal energy stronger.
A magical potion that acts as one of each potion.
A tasty, yummy, delicious extract of various stat potions.
A key which opens an entrance to the Forgotten Island.
A key which opens an entrance to Oryx's Wine Cellar.
An extremely sharp sword made from the strongest and most desirable of all metals.
KILL ME
A large bolt of cloth.
A small bolt of cloth.
A large bolt of cloth.
A small bolt of cloth.
A large bolt of cloth.
A small bolt of cloth.
Light armor crafted from the hard-as-steel leafy sclaes of a Leaf Dragon.
A magic robe woven from enchanted threads of water harvested from a great Water Dragon's body.
Battle armor made from Fire Dragon scales, one of the strongest substances world has ever seen.
A magnificent legendary blade which only cuts those who deserve death.
A great katana charged with the power of the sun itself.
An ancient weapon imbued with the power of the cosmos.
A legendary shuriken that sucks the light in around it.
A rusty old katana.
Gum that temporarily boosts your vitality.
Gum that temporarily boosts your attack.
Gum that temporarily boosts your defense.
Gum that temporarily boosts your speed.
Gum that temporarily boosts your dexterity.
Suitable for practice.
A basic katana.
A striking fine-edged weapon.
A katana capable of cutting a razor-thin line.
An ancient katana with a blade of jet black steel.
A beautiful katana, forged and cooled by the mists atop a g
A mighty weapon wielded by a hero from long ago.
A cruel blade forged in hell flame and blood.
A mighty katana with a crystal eye embeded in the hilt.
One of the legendary great blades of the master Ichimonji.
An evil blade that hungers for blood.
A goddamn Nuke, run for your life
Cause we didn't have enough pets
Cause we didn't have enough pets

Cause we didn't have enough pets

Astro's little helper.
:D
trav's pone
:D
A spiritual defender that protects Prophy from danger.
:D
Don't forget about me. -Astro
Tlp's pone
A unique creature that is said to have been created in a failed laboratory experiment.
A Dark Sonic captured and trained to serve Lucifer on his quest around the realms.
A simple pearl that eminates a magic essence
A pearl charged with electricity. It tingles in your hand.
A pearl that is filled with the power of nature
A powerfull pearl with strong magical properties
A pearl that has pure life enimating from it.
A pearl shrouded in a mysterious veil of darkness. It brings death to all that dare touch it.
This pearl was originally a beautifull white. The red glow is created by the blood of it's victims.
This pearl purifies anything within it's reach, while destroying all that oppose it.
This pearl contains the purest of life and the darkest of evil, when used, this is unleashed in a massive blast.
A simple blueprint for making a turret out of spair materials
A blueprint for making a basic turret
A blueprint for making a slightly more advanced turret
A blueprint for making a turret out of organic materials
A blueprint for making a strong turret made of seashells and coral
A blueprint stolen from malphas, that describes how to create a demonic turret
A blueprint for a turret that creates projectiles from light itself
Ancient drawings that describe how to create an incredibly strong turret
This turret is said to be able to destroy planets with a single shot
This awesome poison creates a cube god
A basic ninja-star.
A ninja-star with four razor-sharp points.
A ninja-star with curved spiraling blades.
A beautifully crafted shuriken.
A sacred shuriken that embodies the power and speed of the wind.
A mystical shuriken formed from ever-frozen ice.
An ancient weapon that spells destruction for all who oppose its master.
An ancient shuriken said to be hotter than the flames of the Sun itself.
A legendary shuriken forged from the strongest and rarest of metals.
A big batch of balloons. Welcome to the Phoenix Private Server!
No party is complete without rad lighting!
A suit of elastic, brightly colored cloth perfect for birthdays.
Oryx uses these party hats to invite guests to his birthdays. Go figure.
A tasty, yummy, delicious extract of various stat potions.
A tasty, yummy, delicious extract of various stat potions.
A large vial holding a super elixir.
A large vial holding a super elixir.
This amulet was forged by the legendary mallard gods for the great Mallard King who is destined to finally end the age of Oryx and bring rise to the age of Mallards!
A cloak sewn with the strongest of Mallard feathers, bathed in the holiest of Mallard lakes for its magical properties.
After the Great Mallard King died, they foraged his skin to make the strongest armor for his son to wear into battles.
Do you dare enter?
This bow once bestowed to the ancient order of hunters, that has since vanished.
The abandoned weapon was forged from the mysterious otherwordly meteor, and holds the immense power inside.
A well-made stone armor, found in the forbidden catacombs under the Kingdom.
Once worn by mighty titans, this amulet protects its wearer from everything and anything.
An ancient golden sword, which once bestowed only to the most powerful of paladins.
A superior shield forged in deep armories for the construct armies of the underworld.
A holy armor blessed in the ancient paladin's shrine.
The legend says the wearer of this amulet would never have any wounds.
A strong, lightweight suit of armor crafted from the hide of the Phoenix God.
A bejeweled robe weaved with fire garnets and the featherweave of the Phoenix God.
A refined-steel set of plate mail embodified and rejuvenated by the essence of the Phoenix God.
A vial of powerful, boiling fluid. It looks like lava, and is very hot. Dare to drink it?
A vial of light, syrupy fluid. It smells of fruit, and emanates the magic of the Eternal Crucible.
A key which opens an entrance to the Eternal Crucible.
An old halo that could be mistaken for scrap metal.
Someone left their halo lying around in the rain.
A halo made out of bronze, it's suprisingly sturdy
A Halo made of silver that brings blessings to all who come near it.
A beautiful Halo crafted out of pure gold, that repels evil spirits of the underworld
A divine Halo that Cures anyone with good intentions and exterminates those with evil ones.
A Halo that was once used by one of the greatest angels of all time, that destroys any evil that dares to approach it.
A simple technique used by samurai-trainees
A somewhat more advanced technique that leaves a stinging pain.
A powerful attack from the shadows used by experienced swordsmen
The user sets their sword ablaze and slashes through his enemies with a powerful strike.
Striking like a bolt of lightning from the sky, the samurai rips through his enemies leaving their charred remains to fall to the ground
A destructive attack used by only the strongest of warriors, countless of demons have fallen to the power of this single strike
Like a dragon in flight, the user unleashes an incredible force upon his enemies, burning their bodies alive and leaving only ashes.
A very simple scroll that summons a cute bunny
A simple scroll that explains how to summon a beach snake
This scroll calls a giant Wasp that can kill enemies with his poisonous sting
This scroll summons a wolf that will attack anything it sees.
This scroll summons a strong green drake that burns anything in it's path
A scroll that summons a magical wisp that purifies anything within it's reach
This scroll summons a dragon in a sea of fire, leaving ultimate distruction wherever it goes
A special summoning scroll that can be bought with minigame Tokens
A blueprint for creating a rapid-fire war turret, only purchasable in the minigame-shop.
A Turkey leg made just on Thanksgiving.
An ancient spear that burns the bodies of the enemies it slays, it only stops burning if the owner dies
This wooden spear's inexpensive flint head makes it perfect for training
This spear has a strong bronze head that does well in battle
An impressive oakwood shaft with a light but sharp silver head make this spear quite deadly
This spear's golden head shimmers in the sunlight as it comes down on it's target
A well made spear with an iron head that will pierce through any enemy
The lightweight birch wooden shaft of this spear makes up for the heavy steel head
This spear has an extremely well sharpened mithril head that can cut straight through a hoard of enemies
An iron spear with a head covered in deadly centipede poison
This spear's head is made completely out of enchanted gemstones
One of the spears used by the legendary valkyrie. It has an own will and chooses whom it kills
It is said that if you are struck by this spear you will never recover from the wound
This spear was used by an incredibly warrior to slay a gigantic dragon. It is imbued with the dragon's magical essence

Projectile.ObjectId: Spear of the Dragon Slayer Projectile

Object.Description: This spear gained it's godly power when it was lunged through the heart of a powerfull deity

Object.id: Spear of the Dragon Slayer Projectile

Object.Description: A katana used by many of Oryx Santa's elf warriors.
This star used to be a tree topper, until a ninja got drunk on eggnog and used it...
The skin of one of Santa Claws' reindeer, which seems to be pretty sturdy when made into armor.
A christmas popper that makes a beautiful rain of colors!
A pretty santa hat with magical powers.
This mysterious miracle seems to be used to make something.
A belt
A Totem
Once the most powerful staff in existence; It used to have a crack in it's frame, but powerfull forging was able to mend it
A simple totem that turns enemies into snakes
A wooden carving of a scary pirate, it has magic eminating from it
Once it was a great foe, but now you turn your great foes into it
A sticky totem that lets you turn your enemies into slimes
A strong magic eminates from this nicely crafted totem
This beautifully crafted totem once belonged to a shaman from an ancient tribe
This incredibly powerful totem was made by sacrificing 100 Cyclops Nobles. It will transform even the strongest foes
You might think this is just a turkey leg with a funny shaped bone, and you'd be right
The santa hat has nothing to do with the key, I don't even know how it got there.
A blade salvaged from the corpse of a Red Demon. Whispers from the depths of tartarus seep through It's hilt.
All who see it quiver in fear before the wielder. For to wield it one must have the strength of an oger and the dexterity of a night elf.
High Druids have debated on the origin of the unusual bone for ages, some say it belongs to the first creature to have ever existed in the realm.
Instead of using it to toughen up your immune system, you decide to give your foes a taste of it. It's even worse than rotten milk.
An orb, made out of pure fury.
A seal, painted pure red with the blood of those who stand before it.
Poison harvested from the floors of Oryx's Wine Cellar. It seems to work pretty well.
None even know about this prism. Nobody has ever been found using it. They're dead before they see it.
Used by one of the greatest heroes of all time, Vorv.
A blade shrouded in mystery that draws in the shadows around it. Its design allows it to move through the air faster than the human eye can see.
An otherworldly blade that has a long history of blood and death behind it. It wasn't always red you know...
A lance of tightly compressed electricity forged at the heart of Asgard.
A spear created from the darkest of magicks and the blood of many beings to slay the great demons of old.
A totem that somehow pulses with wisdom and power.
An intricately carved totem depicting one of the legendary birdmen of the Phoenix.
A scroll that summons a brute from the fiery depths of hell!
A scroll so powerful that it summons knights that fight along side Oryx the Mad God.
A pure white crown dropped from The Forgotten King himself.
Reinforced with magical hard candy from the candy forest. Sticky but strong.
A powerful halo which was crafted by the shadows themselves.
A halo so strong that it will never be forgotten.
Like a whirlpool this will cause the user to drown their opponents with ease.
Like a lightning strike this will strike your foes with a massive force.
